title: Upscale. Ball Park Views. Urban Oasis
posting_body: Take advantage of a prime Downtown Detroit location and all the best the city has to offer!
Your new home comes fully equipped with an in-unit washer/dryer and some paid utilities in a historic Detroit building.
When you join our community, you join a pet-friendly environment with a dog park footsteps from your front door.
Make this spaciously-appointed, 2-bedroom/1-bath apartment your home, with interior features that include:
• Stunning Comerica Park and Downtown Detroit Views.
• Contemporary kitchen with stainless-steel appliances and granite countertops.
Make Broderick Tower your final stop for the best home destination that downtown has to offer.
It would be a pleasure to have you as a resident with us.
To learn more and make our community your home, contact us today to schedule your exclusive tour!
